channel.title: Portforwarded... now i cant use clients?
channel.description: Okay, so i just portforwarded my belkin router, now when i come to open a client, i just get a blank screen and nothing happens... is this because of port forwarding? If somebody could help me this would be great, thanks

item.title: Portforwarded... now i cant use clients?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

because, you cant connect to your ip like that via your computer, others can. if you port forward, set up no-ip, do everything correctly, you still have to use 127.0.0.1 to connect to your server. they will use your no-ip account

Read full topic
item.source: Portforwarded... now i cant use clients?

item.title: Portforwarded... now i cant use clients?
item.dc:creator: @elvenoob101 elvenoob101
item.description:
@elvenoob101 wrote:

If i set my gui to 127.00.1, how will other people connect to my server with the client?

Read full topic
item.source: Portforwarded... now i cant use clients?

item.title: Portforwarded... now i cant use clients?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

this isnt because of port forwarding…
idk how they are now, but 508s usually will get a blank screen or give you a connection error if the server is down. but none of this is because of port forwarding…

if ur connecting to your server, make sure u use 127.0.0.1?

Read full topic
